chapter.title: Orderings
chapter.para: Like expressions, orderings are translated into SQL as parts of queries (and the sorting occurs in the database). Also like expressions, orderings can be used in memory, naturally - to sort objects:Ordering o = new Ordering(Painting.NAME_PROPERTY, SortOrder.ASCENDING_INSENSITIVE); List<Painting> list = ... o.orderList(list);Note that unlike filtering with Expressions, ordering is performed in-place. This list object is reordered and no new list is created.
